snippet: PICKETT--Anna Lou, will be sorely missed by her political, Shelter Island and Ocean Grove extended families. Anna Lou of the big heart, unforgettable Carriage House matriarch. She will forever be an inspiration to multiple generations as political mentor to women, pioneer in the abortion rights movement, activist on community, city-wide and national campaigns and organizations. We will never forget the welcoming weekends in Ocean Grove. With love from the first, second and third generations and friends of our Shelter Island crew 1/3
lead_paragraph: PICKETT--Anna Lou, will be sorely missed by her political, Shelter Island and Ocean Grove extended families. Anna Lou of the big heart, unforgettable Carriage House matriarch. She will forever be an inspiration to multiple generations as political mentor to women, pioneer in the abortion rights movement, activist on community, city-wide and national campaigns and organizations. We will never forget the welcoming weekends in Ocean Grove. With love from the first, second and third generations and friends of our Shelter Island crew 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PICKETT, ANNA LOU
